| History                 = Service de Police de la Ville de Montreal was the Montreal Metropolitan Police Force.

When [[Kara Killgrave (Earth-616)|Kara Killgrave]] stormed the CanAm Building, the police intervened but was taken under Kara's control until [[Alpha Flight (Earth-616)|Alpha Flight]] stunned Kara by freeing the cops from her mind control.{{r|Alpha Flight Vol 4 0.1}}
